snippet: LEAD: The California Supreme Court's recent decision on Proposition 103 contains a lesson for the nation: On the subject of automobile insurance, there's no free ride. Instead of seeking relief from high rates in plebiscites, consumers would do be...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The California Supreme Court's recent decision on Proposition 103 contains a lesson for the nation: On the subject of automobile insurance, there's no free ride. Instead of seeking relief from high rates in plebiscites, consumers would do better to demand measured, rational legislative remedies, beginning with genuine no-fault insurance.

headline.main: The Wrong Road to Auto Insurance
